greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The infinite trunk of greedy squares beanstalk with reversed subsections.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9996
program: (definec (A276584 n) (cond ((zero? n) n) ((= 1 n) 3) (else (let ((maybe_next (A260740 (A276584 (- n 1))))) (if (zero? (A010052 (+ 1 maybe_next))) maybe_next (+ -1 (A000290 (+ 2 (A000196 (+ 1 maybe_next))))))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 07 2016 and Sep 09 2016
